page.title: 05A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: THIS MORNING WHEN I CAME TO SCHOOL I PLAYED WITH MY FRIENDS.AT 8.50 THE HEADTEACHER BLEW THE WHISTLE.WHEN WE CAME IN,WE HUNG UP OUR COATS,HANDED IN OUR HOME-WORK,SAT DOWN AND DID OUR READING.THE REGISTER WAS CALLED AND OUR HANDKERCHIEFS WERE CHECKED.THEN WE LINED UP TO GO TO THE HUT FOR ASSEMBLY WHEN WE SAT DOWN ON THE STAGE,THE HEAD TALKED ABOUT THE BATTLE OF SEDGEMOOR, THEN WE SANG AN HYMN AND SAID A PRAYER WHEN WE RETURNED TO CLASS,WE DID A COMPREHENSION.MY CARD WAS ABOUT SAINT DAVID.PLAY-TIME WAS AT 10.30.WE PLAYED "BULLDOGS".THIS IS HOW YOU PLAY IT. THERE ARE SOME PEOPLE IN ONE BOX AND ONE PERSON IN THE CIRCLE.HE SHOUTS "BULLDOGS"AND EVERYONE HAS TO RUN TO THE OTHER BOX WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT. MORNING PLAY LASTS FOR 15 MINUTES. AFTER THIS WE DO MATHEMATICS,RELIGIOUS EDUCATION,TABLES AND SPELLINGS.
